TITLE: Request Body Structure for Perplexica Search API
DESCRIPTION: Example JSON request body showing the structure for making search requests to Perplexica's API. Includes chat model configuration, embedding model settings, optimization mode, focus mode, query parameters and conversation history.
SOURCE: https://github.com/itzcrazykns/perplexica/blob/master/docs/API/SEARCH.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "chatModel": {
    "provider": "openai",
    "name": "gpt-4o-mini"
  },
  "embeddingModel": {
    "provider": "openai",
    "name": "text-embedding-3-large"
  },
  "optimizationMode": "speed",
  "focusMode": "webSearch",
  "query": "What is Perplexica",
  "history": [
    ["human", "Hi, how are you?"],
    ["assistant", "I am doing well, how can I help you today?"]
  ],
  "systemInstructions": "Focus on providing technical details about Perplexica's architecture.",
  "stream": false
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Up Perplexica Development Environment
DESCRIPTION: Steps to set up the local development environment for Perplexica, including configuration, dependency installation, database setup, and running the application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/itzcrazykns/perplexica/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
npm install
npm run db:push
npm run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Streaming Response Format
DESCRIPTION: Example of JSON stream response format showing the different message types when streaming is enabled, including initialization, sources, response chunks, and completion.
SOURCE: https://github.com/itzcrazykns/perplexica/blob/master/docs/API/SEARCH.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{"type":"init","data":"Stream connected"}
{"type":"sources","data":[{"pageContent":"...","metadata":{"title":"...","url":"..."}},...]}
{"type":"response","data":"Perplexica is an "}
{"type":"response","data":"innovative, open-source "}
{"type":"response","data":"AI-powered search engine..."}
{"type":"done"}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Standard Response Format
DESCRIPTION: Example JSON response format when streaming is disabled, showing the message content and sources used to generate the response.
SOURCE: https://github.com/itzcrazykns/perplexica/blob/master/docs/API/SEARCH.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "message": "Perplexica is an innovative, open-source AI-powered search engine designed to enhance the way users search for information online. Here are some key features and characteristics of Perplexica:\n\n- **AI-Powered Technology**: It utilizes advanced machine learning algorithms to not only retrieve information but also to understand the context and intent behind user queries, providing more relevant results [1][5].\n\n- **Open-Source**: Being open-source, Perplexica offers flexibility and transparency, allowing users to explore its functionalities without the constraints of proprietary software [3][10].",
  "sources": [
    {
      "pageContent": "Perplexica is an innovative, open-source AI-powered search engine designed to enhance the way users search for information online.",
      "metadata": {
        "title": "What is Perplexica, and how does it function as an AI-powered search ...",
        "url": "https://askai.glarity.app/search/What-is-Perplexica--and-how-does-it-function-as-an-AI-powered-search-engine"
      }
    },
    {
      "pageContent": "Perplexica is an open-source AI-powered search tool that dives deep into the internet to find precise answers.",
      "metadata": {
        "title": "Sahar Mor's Post",
        "url": "https://www.linkedin.com/posts/sahar-mor_a-new-open-source-project-called-perplexica-activity-7204489745668694016-ncja"
      }
    }
  ]
}
```

TITLE: Conversation History Format Example
DESCRIPTION: Example JSON array showing the format for conversation history in the request body. Demonstrates how to structure previous interactions between human and assistant.
SOURCE: https://github.com/itzcrazykns/perplexica/blob/master/docs/API/SEARCH.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
[
  ["human", "What is Perplexica?"],
  ["assistant", "Perplexica is an AI-powered search engine..."]
]
```

TITLE: Starting Perplexica with Docker Compose
DESCRIPTION: Command to start Perplexica using Docker Compose in detached mode.
SOURCE: https://github.com/itzcrazykns/perplexica/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker compose up -d
```

LANGUAGE: bash
